1059780.name: Juventus VR - CR7 DAY
1059780.description: What a day it was! Fans lined the streets of Corso Gaetano Scirea to see the famous Cristiano Ronaldo for the first time as a Juventus player. From greeting the fans, to behind-the-scenes action of his medical tests, and, of course, his press conference where he spoke so effortlessly, relive #CR7 day in this video like never before!
1059780.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文
